deal_text: Customer pays $5,000/month billed monthly. Term is 12 months. Provider may change or discontinue features at any time without notice. Customer may not terminate for convenience. Provider may terminate immediately for any breach. Limitation of liability is fees paid in the last 1 month. No service credits for downtime. Governing law: Delaware. Venue: Delaware.

Customer pays $5,000/month billed monthly. Term is 12 months. Provider may change or discontinue features only with Customer’s prior written approval, except for security patches. Either party may terminate for material breach with 30 days to cure. Customer may terminate for convenience with 30 days’ notice. Limitation of liability is fees paid in the last 6 months. Service credits apply if uptime falls below 99.5%. Governing law: Delaware. Venue: Delaware.
Customer said they hated the contract.
Customer requires payment of one million before signing.
Service uptime is 99.5% but no service credits are provided for downtime. Fees billed annually in advance.
